titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the John Waddell Collection of Mining Papers
titlestmt.author: by Alison Clemens

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday March 21, 2019 at 03:00

did.unittitle: John Waddell Collection of Mining Papers

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: The collection consists of manuscript and printed letters, prospectuses, and brochures describing oil and mining investment opportunities in Colorado, Alaska, and Arizona. The bulk of the collection concerns mining ventures in Colorado, and particularly well-represented companites include the Crosby-Ehrich Syndicate, the Jack Pot Mining Company, and Tucker, Ballard, and Company of Colorado Springs; the Ramsay C. Bogy Investment Company of Denver; and the Gold Coin Mining and Leasing Company of Victor. The bulk of the materials is addressed to John Waddell and was collected by him as a prospective investor in oil and mining ventures. Some of letters, prospectuses, and reports include pictorial representations of oil fields. Printed maps of the mines of the Pinnacle Junior Mining Company of Colorado Springs and Alaska's Klondike River Valley are also included.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: John Waddell of Orono, Ontario, mining investor and stock speculator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John Waddell Collection of Mining Papers. Yale Collection of Western Americana, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of manuscript and printed letters, prospectuses, and brochures describing oil and mining investment opportunities in Colorado, Alaska, and Arizona. The bulk of the collection concerns mining ventures in Colorado, and particularly well-represented companites include the Crosby-Ehrich Syndicate, the Jack Pot Mining Company, and Tucker, Ballard, and Company of Colorado Springs; the Ramsay C. Bogy Investment Company of Denver; and the Gold Coin Mining and Leasing Company of Victor. The bulk of the materials is addressed to John Waddell and was collected by him as a prospective investor in oil and mining ventures. Some of letters, prospectuses, and reports include pictorial representations of oil fields. Printed maps of the mines of the Pinnacle Junior Mining Company of Colorado Springs and Alaska's Klondike River Valley are also included.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into five series: I. Colorado Springs, 1896-1914. II. Cripple Creek, 1896-1906. III. Denver, 1879-1913. IV. Victor, 1896-1909. V. Alaska, Arizona, Georgia, and Minnesota, 1898-1914.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collections are processed to a variety of levels, depending on the work necessary to make them usable, their perceived research value, the availability of staff, competing priorities, and whether or not further accruals are expected. The library attempts to provide a basic level of preservation and access for all collections, and does more extensive processing of higher priority collections as time and resources permit.
This collection received a basic level of processing in 2015, including rehousing and minimal organization.

Information included in the Description of Papers note and Collection Contents section is drawn from information supplied with the collection and from an initial survey of the contents. Folder titles appearing in the contents list below are often based on those provided by the creator or previous custodian. Titles have not been verified against the contents of the folders in all cases. Otherwise, folder titles are supplied by staff during initial processing.
This finding aid may be updated periodically to account for new acquisitions to the collection and/or revisions in arrangement and description.

did.unittitle: Colorado Springs
The Beaver Bell Gold Mining Company annual meeting notice
Colorado Springs Gazette
Colorado Springs Board of Trade & Mining Exchange printed card giving commissions and board lots
The Colorado Springs Mining Stock Association printed card listing members names and commissions
Colorado Springs Mining Stock Association, Official Summary of Reports of Listed Companies
The Colorado Springs Mining Stock Association, The Authentic Mining Stock Reporter
The Crosby-Ehrich Syndicate correspondence, stock purchase receipts, and reports
Delaney & Delaney, Banker & Broker letters
The Elkton Consolidated Mining & Milling Company stockholder's notices
The El Paso Consolidated Gold Mining Company stockholder's materials
Gardner & Company letters, reports, and purchase receipts
J.J. Hagerman letter referring to the Bull Mountain Gold Mining Company and its history
The Hamlet Mining & Milling Company prospectus issued by Gardner & Company
The Hermosa Gold Mining Company copies of articles taken from the Colorado Springs Gazette and distributed by the Crosby-Ehrich Syndicate to their clients with a limited offer for stock purchase
Home Gold Mines Company letters, report, and clipping
The Isabella Gold Mining Company letters and meeting notice
Jack Pot Mining Company letters and stockholder's material
The Kimberly Gold Mining Company letter from Company Secretary requesting decision on receipt of dividends in cash or El Paso Consolidated Gold Mining Company stock
C. F. Kjellander & Co., Brokers letter referring to commission rate for the Board of Trade
S. J. Mattocks, mining broker, letter transmitting a certificate for Index
Marr & Middagh letter of introduction to prospective clients giving references and referring to their forthcoming Cripple Creek Mine Handbook
The Molly Dwyre Gold Mining Company letters to stockholders
The Moon-Anchor Gold Mining Company letters
L.C. Nickerson & Company Brokers, two autograph manuscript letters written by L. C. Nickerson to John Waddell attempting to convince him to finance a mining property in Colorado
The Out West Trading Company circular letter written to stockholders regarding a quarterly dividend and an invitation to purchase shares in the company
Frank H. Pettingell, Banker & Broker letter offering 50,000 shares for sale in The Santa Rosa Gold Mining Company
The Pinnacle Junior Mining Company letters, prospectus, and map
Tucker, Ballard & Company, Brokers letters, stock purchase receipts, and stockholder's material
United Gold Mines Company letters and company description
The Western Financing Corporation and The Woods Investment Company letters and market report
Cripple Creek
The Cripple Creek Times letter regarding a subscription, signed by G.S. Hoag, Manager
The Gilpin & Cripple Creek Gold Mining Company report on the development of the Atlanta Mine, located on Bull Hill, Cripple Creek by the Manager A. B. Harmani

The Fulton-Marguerite Mining Company prospectus prepared by The Crosby-Ehrich Syndicate detailing properties, acreage and title, capitalization and treasury reserves, plans for development and subscription stock
The Fulton Marguerite Mining Company letter regarding tax litigation and a stockholder assessment
The Waverly Gold Mining & Milling Company prospectus issued by The Ramsay C. Bogy Investment Co. outlining the company's holdings and presenting a report on the Peg-Leg Mining Claim
Denver
The Anaconda Mining Company letter and report
The Beall Investment Company, Stock Brokers, letters and shareholder's material
Cripple Creek Madonna company description and stock offer written by The Ramsay C. Bogy Investment Company

Gardner, Kirton & Company, Investment Brokers, letter to the stockholders of Jack Pot Mining Company seeking an option on all stock and market report to potential investors detailing some mining companies
Gardner-Stybr Investment Company, Investment Brokers, letters referring to brokerage fees and special information regarding the El Paso Consolidated Gold Mining Company
Johnson, Lute H., letter promoting the Seven Troughs Metals Company, a Nevada Company
The Little Nell Gold Mining Company prospectus written by The Ramsay C. Bogy Investment Company, with a map of the property location and newspaper clippings
The Ramsay C. Bogy Investment Company, Bankers and Brokers, letters and stock information
The Ramsay C. Bogy Investment Company, Bankers and Brokers, letters and stock information
The Torrey Exploration Company letter of introduction outlining management, capitalization and stock available for purchase
Victor
Battle Mountain Consolidated Gold Mining Company abridged prospectus describing the property and presenting an assayer's report
The Gold Coin Mining & Leasing Company letters
Alaska, Arizona, Georgia, and Minnesota
Golden Star Mining and Exploration Company of Duluth, Minnesota, shareholder correspondence concerning dividends and corporate and mine developments
The Klondyke Gold Mining Company letter from H. Gardner, a Colorado mining promoter, describing the company's holdings, with a map of the Klondike on the verso
The Lexington Arizona Mining Company reports
The Southern States Portland Cement Company correspondence concerning plant start-up, financial results, dividend payments, market conditions, strikes, and litigation regarding control of the company
